name: @hexuhua/coc-copilot
description: copilot.vim completion source integration of coc.nvim
author: hexh <250786313@qq.com>

copilot.autoUpdateCompletion.description: Whether to update the completion panel automatically when the copilot result is updated

copilot.triggerCharacters.description: The characters that trigger copilot completions. If not set, some characters will not trigger copilot completions (such as `.@/`)

copilot.timeout.description: coc-copilot uses polling to get results from copilot.vim. If there is no result after <timeout> ms, it is considered that copilot.vim did not return the result, and then the polling ends. The default is 5000ms that same as coc completion default timeout

copilot.showRemainingText.description: Whether to show the remaining text after the completion item in the completion menu. For some languages such as markdown, there is often a lot of text in one line, which can be helpful.
